segments.text: Tom , You're back , come in please.How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll recover after a good night's sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you very much for looking after my house in my absence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's all right.Would you have a cup of coffee ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Please.It ' s very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The rooms are very tidy and the flowers grew very well.You are very helpful . I want to thank you for everything you've done for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I bought you some books on literature , I don't know if you would like them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.Thank you for the trouble you've taken .
segments.speaker: S2
